items.title: Trava Project
items.description:
Trava - Task Management and Team Collaboration System

Role: Backend + Frontend Developer - Team Size: 1 member

Backend:
- Built RESTful APIs using .NET 8, designed with Clean Architecture and CQRS (MediatR)
- Implemented JWT Authentication and role-based authorization
- Integrated PostgreSQL (EF Core) and Redis caching
- Applied Repository Pattern, Unit of Work, and Rate Limiting
- Documented APIs with Swagger/OpenAPI

Frontend:
- Developed SPA using Angular
- Designed responsive UI with TailwindCSS and PrimeNG
- Integrated APIs and handled Authentication, Guards, and HTTP Interceptors
- Built interfaces for managing Spaces, Tasks, Assignments, and Notifications

Tech Stack: .NET 8, EF Core, PostgreSQL, Redis, Azure, Angular, TailwindCSS, PrimeNG, Vercel, JWT

items.title: PhyGen Project
items.description:
Phygen – AI-Powered Physics Exam Generator System

Role: Backend Developer - Team Size: 5 members

Backend:
- Developed RESTful APIs using .NET 8, designed with Clean Architecture and CQRS (MediatR)
- Integrated ChatGPT and Gemini APIs for AI-driven question, solution, and explanation generation
- Designed structured prompt workflows and content validation for high school physics exams
- Implemented JWT Authentication and role-based authorization
- Utilized PostgreSQL (EF Core) and Redis caching for performance optimization
- Deployed backend services on Microsoft Azure

Frontend:
- Built a responsive SPA using React
- Developed dynamic UI for exam generation, topic/difficulty customization, and result preview
- Integrated AI-generated content with real-time user interactions
- Managed authentication flow and API integration
- Deployed frontend on Vercel

Tech Stack: .NET 8, EF Core, PostgreSQL, PayOS, React, Azure, Vercel, ChatGPT API, Gemini API, JWT

items.title: TimeSwap Project
items.description:
TimeSwap – Time Exchange & Job Marketplace Platform

Backend (.NET 8):
- Developed RESTful APIs with JWT authentication and role-based authorization
- Built job management system (posting, search, application, applicant selection)
- Integrated ChatGPT API for AI-powered job assistance
- Implemented E-Wallet system with PostgreSQL and deployed on DigitalOcean

Frontend (Angular 18):
- Developed responsive SPA with authentication flow (Guard, Interceptor)
- Built job listing, search, application, and profile management features
- Integrated Google Maps API for location-based job search
- Deployed frontend on Vercel

Mobile (Android – Kotlin):
- Developed Android app using Kotlin, Jetpack Compose (MVVM)
- Integrated backend APIs via Retrofit and Google Maps API
- Implemented AI chatbot using ChatGPT API
- Applied secure data handling and performance optimization

Tech Stack: .NET 8, PostgreSQL, JWT, Angular 18, Kotlin, Jetpack Compose, Google Maps API, ChatGPT API

items.title: Adobe Migration Project
items.description:
Content Migration Project – Adobe Experience Manager (AEM)

Role: Migration Developer | Team Size: ~40 members

- Contributed to a large-scale enterprise content migration project using Adobe Experience Manager (AEM)
- Migrated and validated landing pages from legacy CMS to AEM platform
- Ensured data accuracy, content consistency, and structural integrity across environments
- Followed structured workflows and task tracking using Jira
- Maintained QA checklists and validation reports in Excel
- Collaborated within an Agile team, improving cross-functional communication and enterprise workflow understanding

Tech Stack: Adobe Experience Manager (AEM), Jira, Excel, Agile/Scrum
